headline: The Bull Case For Pennant Group (PNTG) Could Change Following Truist Upgrade And Medicare Rule Shift
summary: Recently, Truist Securities upgraded The Pennant Group to a “buy” rating, highlighting improving operating trends, strong demand for senior care, and reduced reimbursement risk following a more favorable 2026 Medicare home health rule. This shift in analyst sentiment, combined with smoother-than-expected integration of newly acquired Amedisys locations, points to potentially stronger operational resilience for Pennant’s home health and senior living platform. With Truist highlighting reduced...
